messages.title: The choice at this election:
messages.content: 5 more years of Gordon Brown or Change with the Conservatives. The Conservatives must win here to stop another 5 years of Gordon Brown.

messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: In less than a week Britain votes in the most important national election for a generation...

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives must win here to stop another 5 years of Gordon Brown.

issues.governance: to cut waste and the number of MPs
issues.health: The new hospital in Pembury is now being built, but what about other local health services?

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the last five years I've worked hard on many local issues - the new hospital, dualling the A21 and defending our local Post Offices. But there is a lot to fight for, I am passionate about our area and I promise that I will always work hard for you and our community.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Tunbridge Wells
Shadow Secretary of State for Energy & Climate Change

politicalExperience.achievements: Directly involved with local charities and community groups including the Hawkhurst and Community Hospital League of Friends.
Winner of Charity Champion Award for campaigning in Parliament.

images.caption: FIGHTING TO SAVE OUR POST OFFICES
